column2: The United States is one out of 193 countries in the United Nations, and yet we pay 22 percent of the entire budget and more.
column4: All of our taxpayers are paying roughly 22% of the U.N. budget.

column2: In fact, we pay far more than anybody realizes.
column4: All of our taxpayers are paying roughly 22% of the U.N. budget.

column2: We are celebrating the 230th anniversary of our beloved Constitution, the oldest constitution still in use in the world today.
column4: The United States has "the longest surviving constitution."

column2: We cannot let a murderous regime continue these destabilizing activities while building dangerous missiles, and we cannot abide by an agreement if it provides cover for the eventual construction of a nuclear program.
column4: Says Iran has "violated the terms of the (nuclear) deal."
